actions.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 101 - 322 (Roll no. 117).

description: Amendment sought to offset funding by requiring an across the board cut of all FY 2000 non-defense discretionary spending equal to the amount in the bill minus the amount of NATO reimbursements.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 and printed in H. Rept. 106-127 to offset funding by requiring an across the board cut of all FY 2000 non-defense discretionary spending equal to the amount in the bill minus the amount of NATO reimbursements and exempts certain programs including WIC nutrition programs from the reductions.
